General.Name: Shenke Slide Bearing Corp
General.Description: Shenke Slide Bearing Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, produces, and sells thick-walled sliding bearings and accessories in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers DQY end cover sliding bearing series and ZQ/ZQKT pedestal sliding bearing series, which are used in large and medium-sized AC and DC motors, and other rotating machinery. The company also provide ZH dynamic and static pressure seat sliding bearing series used for large reversible variable speed AC and DC motors, such as rolling mills, mine hoists, etc.; VTBS vertical thrust bearing series which are used in hydraulic generators, water pumps, etc. In addition, it offer 1000MW/600MW/300MW bearing series used in steam turbine generators; bearing department kits for hydropower, thermal power, wind power, nuclear power generation equipment and the peripheral components and accessories of the bearing in the motor, including main shaft, turbine generator motor volute and end cover, gas turbine cylinder, wind turbine hub, engine room, wind turbine base, etc. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Zhuji, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 1, Jiangong East Road, Zhuji, China, 311800
